title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - TDK SensEI built scalable IoT platform with AWS for sensor insights (NTA204)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - TDK SensEI 利用 AWS 构建可扩展物联网平台以获取传感器洞察 (NTA204)
abstract: TDK SensEI, launched in July 2024, partnered with AWS to create an innovative predictive maintenance (PdM) solution for manufacturing. This session details our journey from concept to deployment across multiple factories, showcasing how we utilized AWS IoT Core, Greengrass, and SageMaker to build a secure, scalable platform for real-time machine health monitoring. Key architectural decisions included our edge computing strategy, ML model deployment, and data pipeline optimization. We implemented automated anomaly detection and integrated generative AI for predictive maintenance insights. This session offers valuable insights for those building industrial IoT solutions or interested in manufacturing modernization, highlighting the process of creating production-ready IoT platforms on AWS.
abstract_cn: TDK SensEI于2024年7月推出，与AWS合作为制造业创建了创新的预测性维护(PdM)解决方案。本次会议详细介绍了我们从概念到在多个工厂部署的历程，展示了我们如何利用AWS IoT Core、Greengrass和SageMaker构建安全、可扩展的实时机器健康监控平台。关键架构决策包括我们的边缘计算策略、ML模型部署和数据管道优化。我们实施了自动化异常检测，并集成生成式AI用于预测性维护洞察。本次会议为构建工业物联网解决方案或对制造业现代化感兴趣的人员提供了宝贵见解，重点介绍了在AWS上创建生产就绪物联网平台的过程。
